doc.title: Arms of Mass Derision: The New American Activism
doc.plot: A new breed of American activist - lightning quick, sometimes cruel, and terribly efficient commandos of another sort - has been born. Exclusively Americans, their target is the system. Their weapon: humor! And they can really cause damage. These little "siblings" of Michael Moore are fluent in the art of communication and create disturbances with a masterly hand. They are always ready for combat, whether it be the war in Iraq, health care, the environment, or the stock market.
